name: report-action
description: Github actions to trigger report generation for runtime security.

scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:post
scripts.build:main: npx ncc build src/main/index.ts -o dist/main --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.build:post: npx ncc build src/post/index.ts -o dist/post --source-map --license licenses.txt
